name: RetrieveSalesChannels
description:
Retrieve bulk information about sales channels.

Use this tool to fetch detailed information about multiple sales channels for business operations.

parameters.name: channel_identifiers
parameters.description: A list of IDs representing sales channels to retrieve details for.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
